questions.question: A company has an ML model that needs to run one time each night to predict stock values. The model input is 3 MB of data that is collected during the current day. The model produces the predictions for the next day. The prediction process takes less than 1 minute to finish running. Which Amazon SageMaker AI deployment option will meet these requirements MOST cost-effectively?
options: Use a multi-model serverless endpoint. Enable caching.
Use an asynchronous inference endpoint. Set the InitialInstanceCount parameter to 0.
Use a real-time endpoint. Configure an auto scaling policy to scale the model to 0 when the model is not in use.
Use a serverless inference endpoint. Set the MaxConcurrency parameter to 1.
correct_answers: Use a serverless inference endpoint. Set the MaxConcurrency parameter to 1.
